title: removed singletons for texture loading
message:
removed singletons for texture loading

Holding textures in a static class caused them to be preserved across
pause/resume of an application. Libgdx doesn't like this internally
and it gets the texture objects mixed up.

title: don't preserve game state over pause/resume
message: don't preserve game state over pause/resume
